variants.Description in input context: p.R191Q variant in the VCP gene

Described Disease.Described Disease: Inclusion Body Myopathy with Paget Disease of Bone and Frontotemporal Dementia (IBMPFD)

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Cell Culture and Protein Expression Analysis

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids encoding wild-type and p.R191Q mutant VCP.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells expressing p.R191Q showed reduced ubiquitin ligase activity and increased proteasome-associated aggregates compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each biological replicate was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type VCP-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and Student's t-test were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels â‰¥ 80% of wild-type activity.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels < 50% of wild-type activity.
